Sentencas: (La0.8Sr0.2)(0.95)MnO3-delta (LSM) and (Er0.2Bi0.8)(2)O-3 (ESB) composite has shown promise as a potential candidate for low temperature solid oxide fuel cell (LT-SOFC) cathodes.
Titulo: Durability of (La0.8Sr0.2)0.95MnO3-δ-(Er0.2Bi0.8)2O3 composite cathodes for low temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: Here the stability of LSM-ESB composite cathode was tested under a range of temperature between 500 degrees C and 650 degrees C in symmetrical cell configuration, and the changes in cathode area specific resistance (ASR) was monitored in situ using electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS).
Titulo: Durability of (La0.8Sr0.2)0.95MnO3-δ-(Er0.2Bi0.8)2O3 composite cathodes for low temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: Two different mechanisms govern the LSM-ESB performance degradation in different temperature regions.
Titulo: Durability of (La0.8Sr0.2)0.95MnO3-δ-(Er0.2Bi0.8)2O3 composite cathodes for low temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: At 600 degrees C and below the decrease in ESB conductivity due to the order-disorder transition of ESB significantly impacts the ohmic resistance of the cells.
Titulo: Durability of (La0.8Sr0.2)0.95MnO3-δ-(Er0.2Bi0.8)2O3 composite cathodes for low temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: Moreover, the surface catalytic activity of LSM-ESB is directly affected by the order-disorder transition, possibly due to changes in the oxygen incorporation rate of ESB.
Titulo: Durability of (La0.8Sr0.2)0.95MnO3-δ-(Er0.2Bi0.8)2O3 composite cathodes for low temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: At 650 degrees C, above the order-disorder transition, LSM and ESB react to form tertiary phases in as little as 180 h.
Titulo: Durability of (La0.8Sr0.2)0.95MnO3-δ-(Er0.2Bi0.8)2O3 composite cathodes for low temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: Our results suggest that bismuth transports through vapor phase and deposits across the porous electrode surface.
Titulo: Durability of (La0.8Sr0.2)0.95MnO3-δ-(Er0.2Bi0.8)2O3 composite cathodes for low temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: These results reveal the possible degradation mechanisms for bismuth-oxide based composite cathodes.
Titulo: Durability of (La0.8Sr0.2)0.95MnO3-δ-(Er0.2Bi0.8)2O3 composite cathodes for low temperature SOFCs

Sentencas: These findings are important for the future development of SOFCs and the selection of potential cathode candidates that incorporate bismuth oxide.
Titulo: Durability of (La0.8Sr0.2)0.95MnO3-δ-(Er0.2Bi0.8)2O3 composite cathodes for low temperature SOFCs
Durability of (La0.8Sr0.2)0.95MnO3-δ-(Er0.2Bi0.8)2O3 composite cathodes for low temperature SOFCs
